title: Tommy Fury admits he's gained weight after Love Island
text:

Tommy Fury has admitted that he's gained some weight since leaving the villa as he is so loved up with other half Molly-Mae Hague .

The 20-year-old boxer confessed that he's "gained a few pounds" during their whirlwind romance as he gushed over his influencer girlfriend, who is also 20.

His reveal came at the Pride of Britain Awards, when he was told he looked like "the cat that got the cream".

He told MailOnline : "Well, I mean I've gained a few pounds but obviously I got my woman by the side of me - look at her," revealing he's so happy and comfortable with Molly-Mae that he's let himself loose around her.

Throughout the glamorous night, Tommy and Molly put on a very cosy display - with Tommy grabbing his girlfriend by the waist at every possible moment.

Discussing their new relationship since leaving the villa a few months back, Molly-Mae admitted she knew it would be as good as it is between them when they were back to reality.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

Nodding her head in encouragement, she said: "When we met each other we knew how it was gonna go and I think we've just gone from strength to strength and I think everyone's seen that. So, yeah - it's been really good."

Dishing out more details of their loved-up life, the pair confessed "it's not been hard" adjusting to their new famous lifestyle, and that they "spend a lot of time together".

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Molly gushed: "We're so happy right now. We didn't need to win to show everyone what we've got," hitting back at fakery claims.

The pair also revealed that they "never argue", with Tommy adding: "I wish we did!"

Despite this, the blonde beauty ignored her boyfriend while she browsed her phone at their first Pride of Britain event.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: REX)

The so-called loved-up duo spent Pride of Britain "engrossed in their phones" according to eye-witnesses.

Sources spied Molly-Mae glued to her phone as she kept her 3.4million fans in the loop from the glittering event and she uploaded a number of stories.

The blonde was said only to look up to snap selfies with her adoring fans.

(Image: Beretta/Sims/REX)

An eye-witness told The Mirror of the scene: "Tommy and Molly-Mae were utterly engrossed in their phones, despite this being their first ever Pride of Britain.

"They were sitting at the same table as Ferne McCann, Molly didn't seem at all interested in chatting to the other celebs or even her own boyfriend.

"The only time she looked up was when some girls came over to take some selfies with Tommy, then she went straight back to Instagramming."
description: Tommy Fury, 20, is so in love with girlfriend Molly-Mae that he's 'gained a few pounds' since leaving the villa
